title: Sparkle up: Festive Glam Makeup look
text:
With the festivities just around the corner, we are high on excitement! And of course, we all want to look our glamorous best. This festive makeup look is all about the sparkle and glitz and when your outfit is not making the cut; you can rely on this makeup look for that extra glam quotient.





It's time to stock your makeup shelf with some bold eye makeup products. And why not? Because the festive and party season is reason enough to try a new look that you wouldn’t try otherwise. To help you explore your adventurous 'beauty' side, here’s a festive makeup tutorial that will get you into the party mood.
description: This festive makeup look is all about the sparkle and glitz and when your outfit is not making the cut; you can rely on this makeup look for that extra glam quo
